snippet: Ilona Szwarc is fascinated by the little girls who collect American Girl dolls. The result? An evocative series of formal portraits of little women with their tiny, well-dressed doppelgangers.
abstract: Ilona Szwarc is fascinated by the little girls who collect American Girl dolls. The result? An evocative series of formal portraits of little women with their tiny, well-dressed doppelgangers.

headline.main: A Mirror on Growing Up in America
